message: I admit I kinda liked the idea that the only physical trait we're good at as humans compared to other animals is running long distances.
did you read his book? just received it as a gift - can't wait to open it up...
No, I havn't. Tell, if it's any good. :)
awesome so far - only reluctantly put it down last night...think i am going to bring it to work today actually, ha :)
Just ordered it myself, after coming home from buying another pair of "barefoot" running shoes.
I'm putting it on my wishlist!

Finished reading the book yesterday. Interesting and fun read. I'm a little sceptical towards the evangelizing and the romanticization of native tribes, but I guess I can subscribe to the general premises of running style.
ya finished it a couple weeks ago - definitely an entertaining read...makes you want to get out there and race!
